verses.verse: Behold <S%H5650><s%>, my servant, whom I uphold <S%H8551><s%>; my chosen <S%H972><s%>, in whom my soul <S%H5315><s%> delighteth <S%H7521><s%>: I have put <S%H5414><s%> my Spirit <S%H7307><s%> upon him <S%H3318><s%>; he will bring forth justice <S%H4941><s%> to the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%>.
He will not cry <S%H6817><s%>, nor lift up <S%H5375><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, nor cause it to be heard <S%H8085><s%> in the street <S%H2351><s%>.

A bruised <S%H7533><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> will he not break <S%H7665><s%>, and a dimly <S%H3544><s%> burning wick <S%H6594><s%> will he not quench <S%H3518><s%>: he will bring forth <S%H3318><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%>.

He will not fail <S%H3543><s%> nor be discouraged <S%H7533><s%>, till he have set <S%H7760><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>; and the isles <S%H339><s%> shall wait <S%H3176><s%> for his law <S%H8451><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> God <S%H410><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, he that created <S%H1254><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and stretched them forth <S%H5186><s%>; he that spread abroad <S%H7554><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and that which cometh out <S%H7554><s%> of it <S%H5414><s%>; he that giveth breath <S%H5397><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%> upon it <S%H7307><s%>, and spirit to them that walk therein <S%H1980><s%>:

I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have called <S%H7121><s%> thee in righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and will hold <S%H2388><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, and will keep <S%H5341><s%> thee <S%H5414><s%>, and give thee for a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, for a light <S%H216><s%> of the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%>;

to open <S%H6491><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> eyes <S%H5869><s%>, to bring out <S%H3318><s%> the prisoners <S%H616><s%> from the dungeon <S%H4525><s%>, and them that sit <S%H3427><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> out of the <S%H3608><s%> prison-house <S%H1004><s%>.

I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that is my name <S%H8034><s%>; and my glory <S%H3519><s%> will I not give <S%H5414><s%> to another <S%H312><s%>, neither my praise <S%H8416><s%> unto graven images <S%H6456><s%>.

Behold <S%H7223><s%>, the former things are come to pass <S%H935><s%>, and new things <S%H2319><s%> do I declare <S%H5046><s%>; before they spring forth <S%H6779><s%> I tell you of them <S%H8085><s%>.

Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%>, and his praise <S%H8416><s%> from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; ye that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and all that is therein <S%H4393><s%>, the isles <S%H339><s%>, and the inhabitants thereof <S%H3427><s%>.

Let the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof lift up <S%H5375><s%> their voice <S%H2691><s%>, the villages that Kedar <S%H6938><s%> doth inhabit <S%H3427><s%>; let the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Sela <S%H5553><s%> sing <S%H7442><s%>, let them shout <S%H6681><s%> from the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>.
Let them give <S%H7760><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and declare <S%H5046><s%> his praise <S%H8416><s%> in the islands <S%H339><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will go forth <S%H3318><s%> as a mighty man <S%H1368><s%>; he will stir up <S%H5782><s%> his zeal <S%H7068><s%> like a man <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>: he will cry <S%H7321><s%>, yea <S%H6873><s%>, he will shout aloud; he will do mightily <S%H1396><s%> against his enemies <S%H341><s%>.

I have long time <S%H5769><s%> holden my peace <S%H2814><s%>; I have been still <S%H2790><s%>, and refrained <S%H662><s%> myself <S%H6463><s%>: now will I cry out like a travailing woman <S%H3205><s%>; I will gasp <S%H5395><s%> and pant <S%H7602><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

I will lay waste <S%H2717><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%> and hills <S%H1389><s%>, and dry up <S%H3001><s%> all their herbs <S%H6212><s%>; and I will make <S%H7760><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> islands <S%H339><s%>, and will dry up <S%H3001><s%> the pools <S%H98><s%>.

And I will bring <S%H3212><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> by a way <S%H1870><s%> that they know <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H5410><s%>; in paths that they know <S%H3045><s%> not will I lead <S%H1869><s%> them <S%H7760><s%>; I will make darkness <S%H4285><s%> light <S%H216><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H4625><s%>, and crooked places straight <S%H4334><s%>. These things <S%H4625><s%> will I do <S%H6213><s%>, and I will not forsake them <S%H5800><s%>.

They shall be turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%>, they shall be utterly <S%H1322><s%> put to shame <S%H954><s%>, that trust <S%H982><s%> in graven images <S%H6459><s%>, that say <S%H559><s%> unto molten images <S%H4541><s%>, Ye are our gods <S%H430><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, ye deaf <S%H2795><s%>; and look <S%H5027><s%>, ye blind <S%H5787><s%>, that ye may see <S%H7200><s%>.

Who is blind <S%H5787><s%>, but my servant <S%H5650><s%>? or deaf <S%H2795><s%>, as my messenger <S%H4397><s%> that I send <S%H7971><s%>? who is blind <S%H5787><s%> as he that is at peace <S%H7999><s%> with me <S%H5787><s%>, and blind as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s servant <S%H5650><s%>?
Thou seest <S%H7200><s%> many things <S%H7227><s%>, but thou observest <S%H8104><s%> not <S%H241><s%>; his ears are open <S%H6491><s%>, but he heareth not <S%H8085><s%>.
It pleased <S%H2654><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, for his righteousness <S%H6664><s%>' sake <S%H1431><s%>, to magnify the law <S%H8451><s%>, and make it honorable <S%H142><s%>.

But this is a people <S%H5971><s%> robbed <S%H962><s%> and plundered <S%H8154><s%>; they are all of them snared <S%H6351><s%> in holes <S%H2352><s%>, and they are hid <S%H2244><s%> in prison <S%H3608><s%> - houses <S%H1004><s%>: they are for a prey <S%H957><s%>, and none delivereth <S%H5337><s%>; for a spoil <S%H4933><s%>, and none saith <S%H559><s%>, Restore <S%H7725><s%>.
Who is there among you that will give ear <S%H238><s%> to this <S%H7181><s%>? that will hearken and hear <S%H8085><s%> for the time to come <S%H268><s%>?

Who gave <S%H5414><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for a spoil <S%H4933><s%>, and Israel <S%H3478><s%> to the robbers <S%H962><s%>? did not Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>? he against whom <S%H2098><s%> we have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and in whose ways <S%H1870><s%> they would <S%H14><s%> not walk <S%H1980><s%>, neither were they obedient <S%H8085><s%> unto his law <S%H8451><s%>.

Therefore he poured <S%H8210><s%> upon him the fierceness <S%H2534><s%> of his anger <S%H639><s%>, and the strength <S%H5807><s%> of battle <S%H4421><s%>; and it set him on fire <S%H3857><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, yet he knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H1197><s%>; and it burned him <S%H7760><s%>, yet he laid it not to heart <S%H3820><s%>.
